about.title: Representative Introduction
about.subtitle: The determination to do what you want now, not in old age

story.p1: I loved Japan. The atmospheric streetscapes, hot springs that heal mind and body, local cuisine, and warm people. Someday, traveling throughout this beloved Japan was my dream.
story.p2: However, the reality was that of a busy salaryman. Extended vacations were a pipe dream, and I told myself that 'touring Japan would be a pleasure for retirement' and was almost giving up.
story.p3: Then came a turning point that would change my life 180 degrees. It was my infection with the novel coronavirus.
story.p4: Alone, isolated in a room for a week. In a situation facing the fear of death, only one thought crossed my mind: 'If I want to do something, I must do it now or I'll regret it. Life is far too short.'
story.p5: The day I could leave my room, my second life began. In just one week of isolation, I had finished planning everything needed to build my own camper.
story.p6: Selecting the base vehicle, designing a slide bed for a family of four, arranging a desk for work, identifying requirements for 8-number registration to meet regulations, building a sub-battery system, and even sourcing wood for the interior. The blueprint in my head was completely finished.
story.p7: I immediately bought a 2008 HiAce Super Long (same size as an ambulance!) for 1.7 million yen. From there, for two months, I devoted all available time to DIY - after work on weekdays, weekends, and breaks during remote work.
story.p8: And then came the summer vacation I had been aiming for. Before the first car camping trip with my family, the one-of-a-kind original camper was finally completed.
story.p9: That trip was unimaginably moving. Passing by fully booked hotels, experiencing the excitement of Aomori Nebuta Festival and Nagaoka Fireworks Festival on the front lines. In summer Hokkaido, we enjoyed nature for 10 days without worrying about skyrocketing accommodation costs, surrounded by our children's beaming smiles.
story.p10: Through this experience, I became convinced: 'Can one vehicle enrich life to this extent?'
story.p11: And this free journey gave me the next dream I would stake my life on. That is, to make this camper a 'development base for traveling the world,' creating new value while interacting with cultures and people around the world, without being bound by location.
story.p12: Specifically, developing innovative applications using AI technology and delivering them to users worldwide through the Apple platform. Pouring inspiration gained from travels into development in real-time, making people's lives more convenient and enriched. I found this form of contribution.
story.p13: Dreams I had almost given up on as a salaryman. But in this one life, I don't want to have any more regrets. Travel the world, create value, and fully enjoy encounters. And someday, when I face the end of my life, I want to smile from my heart saying 'It was the best life.' 'TrailfusionAI' is the name of that oath.

additionalStory.p15: Fusion: The 'fusion' of real travel experiences with digital creation of AI app development. And 'fusing' the thoughts of users around the world with ours.

Build Your Own
Camper Van
cta.description: Your ideal mobile home that can't be achieved with commercial camper vans. The joy of DIY creation and days of free travel after completion await you.

pillars.title: 4 Pillars of DIY Camper Van
pillars.description: Four important elements to achieve professional-level results. By mastering these, you can complete a high-quality mobile home that cannot be achieved with commercial kits.

items.title: Perfect Insulation & Soundproofing
items.description: Triple-layer structure based on scientific evidence achieves comfortable indoor environment throughout the four seasons. Mountaintop silence even inside the vehicle.

items.title: Functional Living Space
items.description: Multifunctional furniture and storage systems that maximize limited space. Comfortable space to relax even by the lakeside.

items.title: Independent Power System
items.description: Independent solar power generation and large-capacity batteries enable civilized living even in places without power sources. Power security even while listening to waterfall sounds.

items.title: Four-Season HVAC Equipment
items.description: Combination of air conditioning, FF heater, and ventilation system maintains comfortable room temperature on beaches and snowy mountains.

guide.title: DIY Camper Van Build Guide
guide.description: Detailed step-by-step build process that even beginners can understand. Revealing all the know-how to achieve professional-level results.

vibrationDamping.title: Creating Silent Space (Vibration Damping, Soundproofing, Insulation)
vibrationDamping.description: Essential process that forms the foundation of comfortable living space and reduces HVAC load for retrofitted systems. A scientifically-based 'triple-layer' approach is essential.

flooring.title: Perfect Floor Construction
flooring.description: Building a completely flat and highly insulated floor that serves as the foundation for all furniture.

paneling.title: Wall and Ceiling Paneling
paneling.description: Using lightweight cedar or red pine tongue-and-groove boards. Cannot be directly attached to curved vehicle walls; must first install wooden sub-frame called 'furring strips' to vehicle metal ribs.

slideBed.title: Multi-functional Slide Bed
slideBed.description: The heart of space-saving design that functions as sofa during day and bed at night.

galley.title: Galley (Kitchen Unit)
galley.description: Unit equipped with sink and self-contained water supply/drainage system. Composed of 12V submersible pump and water tanks, using food sanitation law compliant hoses.

wiring.title: Wiring Guide
wiring.description: 3kW inverter (250A+) requires extra-thick cables like 38sq and 300A class fuses, while 50A driving charger needs 8sq+ cables and 70A class fuses.

charging.title: 3-System Charging Setup
charging.description: Centering around Renogy 50A DC-DC charger (with MPPT function) for integrated management of driving charge, solar charge, and external 100V charge.

hvac.title: Four-Season HVAC System
hvac.description: Equipment for performing 'major surgery' on vehicle to make it a true 'mobile home'.

entertainment.title: Entertainment System
entertainment.description: Equipment for comfortable extended van life stays. Installing 12V TV, sound system, Wi-Fi router, etc. to achieve comfortable living environment while mobile.

requirements.title: Structural Requirements Verification
requirements.description: Final verification that legal requirements for registration as 8-number (special purpose vehicle) are met.

procedure.title: Registration Application Procedure
procedure.description: Complete procedure for 8-number registration including on-site vehicle inspection at transport bureau. Achieving smooth procedures from document preparation to final registration certificate issuance.
